casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Solomon TAYLOR Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 10, 2018

Lisa J. Steele, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Harry Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 18, 171 A.3d 1061 (2017), is denied.
